original_text: There was a yard round the outside of the tabernacle and the altar. Gershon's family took care of the curtains that hung round the yard, with their ropes. They also took care of the curtain at the entrance to the yard. They took care of all those kinds of things.
korean_text: 뜰의 휘장과 및 성막과 제단 사방에 있는 뜰의 휘장 문과 그 모든 것에 쓰는 줄들이니라

sentences.original_text: There was a yard round the outside of the tabernacle and the altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 성막과 제단의 바깥 둘레에 마당이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Gershon's family took care of the curtains
They also took care of the curtain at the entrance to the yard.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 마당 입구의 커튼도 돌보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They took care of all those kinds of things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그런 모든 종류의 것들을 돌보았습니다.
